    • Uses of ProjectContext in hc.server.ui

      return current project context

      return current project context
      ProjectContext Mlet.getProjectContext()
      return current project context
      static ProjectContext ProjectContext.getProjectContext()
      return the projectContext instance of the current project.

      you can invoke this method anywhere even if there are two or more active projects.
